scripts.solc:velo: cat velo_scope.txt | xargs ls -d 2>/dev/null | xargs wc -l
scripts.load: cd test/backtest && env $(cat ../../.env | xargs) python3 loader.py
scripts.backtest: forge build && cd test/backtest && env $(cat ../../.env | xargs) python3 HistoryTest.py
scripts.deploy:base:velo:prod: forge script src/scripts/deploy/optimism/DeployVeloLazy.s.sol --rpc-url $(grep BASE_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --etherscan-api-key $(grep API_KEY_OP .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --broadcast --verify --slow --private-key $(grep DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --evm-version shanghai
scripts.deploy:base:velo:bot: forge script src/scripts/deploy/optimism/DeployPulseVeloBotLazy.s.sol --fork-url $(grep BASE_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --etherscan-api-key $(grep API_KEY_OP .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --broadcast --slow
scripts.deploy:base:velo:strat: forge script src/scripts/deploy/optimism/DeployStrategy.s.sol --rpc-url $(grep BASE_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --etherscan-api-key $(grep API_KEY_OP .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --broadcast --slow --verify --private-key $(grep DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --evm-version shanghai
scripts.deploy:base:velo:sugar: forge script src/scripts/deploy/optimism/DeployVeloSugarHelper.s.sol --rpc-url $(grep BASE_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --etherscan-api-key $(grep API_KEY_OP .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --broadcast --slow --verify
